MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH16 postcode area of Edinburgh. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 12:20am to carry out safe repairs to faulty equipment on Lonfarmacus Road and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:20am. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:30am on 5th December
